docs.text: MkDocs Demo ¶ MkDocs Links MkDocs Material for MkDocs Markdown Cheatsheet MkDocs Demo* Github repo MkDocs Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server mkdocs build - Build the documentation site mkdocs help - Print this help message
docs.title: Home

docs.text: MkDocs Links MkDocs Material for MkDocs Markdown Cheatsheet MkDocs Demo* Github repo MkDocs Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server mkdocs build - Build the documentation site mkdocs help - Print this help message
docs.title: MkDocs Demo

docs.text: Github User and Organization Websites ¶ User and Organization websites are described here User and Organization Details MkDocs content is kept in org-name-mkdocs repo The site is built with: cd ../org-name.github.io; mkdocs gh-deploy --config-file ../org-name-mkdocs/mkdocs.yml --remote-branch master The site content is pushed to the org-name.github.io repo's master branch
docs.title: Organization

docs.text: User and Organization websites are described here User and Organization Details MkDocs content is kept in org-name-mkdocs repo The site is built with: cd ../org-name.github.io; mkdocs gh-deploy --config-file ../org-name-mkdocs/mkdocs.yml --remote-branch master The site content is pushed to the org-name.github.io repo's master branch
docs.title: Github User and Organization Websites

docs.text: Github Project Websites ¶ Project websites are described here . Project Details An empty .nojekyll file is required in the root The site is built with: mkdocs gh-deploy The site content is pushed to the Project repo's gh_pages branch
docs.title: Project

docs.text: Project websites are described here . Project Details An empty .nojekyll file is required in the root The site is built with: mkdocs gh-deploy The site content is pushed to the Project repo's gh_pages branch
docs.title: Github Project Websites

docs.text: MkDocs Setup ¶ MkDocs Project Layout mkdocs.yml # Configuration file .gitignore # exclude site/ docs/ CNAME # Custom domain name assets/images/favicon.ico # favicon file images/owls.png # logo file index.md # Website homepage ... # Markdown pages, images and other files site/ # Generated website (not included in repo)
docs.title: Setup
